name: Drift Market
description:
WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND THE USE OF A CONTROLLER

Drift Market is a supermarket space racing game that consists of gathering a number of objects in the shortest possible time.

CONTROLS:

WASD / LEFT JOYSTICK - Move

SPACE / X / A - Drift

F / SQUARE / X - Interact

MOUSE / RIGHT JOYSTICK - Move the camera

R / TRIANGLE / Y - Reset the shopping cart (use in case of getting stuck)

We are a group of students of Video Game Design and Development at the Rey Juan Carlos University developing a racing game with Unity!

Follow us! https://twitter.com/DriftMarket
